title: Victoria's Secret: Angels and Demons
description:
Tig and Cheryl hit the mall and try on Hulu's "Victoria's Secret: Angels and Demons," a 3-part docuseries about the controversial brand known for bringing lingerie and provocative runway shows to the masses. Plus, some MAJOR bluebells, jokes from Crackie, and much more!

*this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

  • Follow the show:
  • Instagram: @tigandcheryltruestory
  • Twitter: @TandCTrueStory


Rate Tig and Cheryl: True Story on Spotify and Apple Podcasts and leave a review for Tig and Cheryl.
